# Nativz
> Nativz is a DFW-based digital marketing agency specializing in creative content production, social media management, advertising, website development, SEO, AI marketing services, and full-service brand amplification.

## Services

### Social Media Management
- [Social Media Management](/services/social-media-management/): Full-service organic content strategy, community management, and algorithm-optimized posting.
  - [Facebook](/services/social-media-management/facebook/): Andromeda-optimized Facebook page management.
  - [Instagram](/services/social-media-management/instagram/): Reels-first strategy, feed curation, Stories, DM management.
  - [LinkedIn](/services/social-media-management/linkedin/): B2B thought leadership and employee advocacy.
  - [TikTok](/services/social-media-management/tiktok/): Trend-driven, creator-style TikTok management.
  - [YouTube](/services/social-media-management/youtube/): Long-form video strategy and Shorts optimization.
  - [X (Twitter)](/services/social-media-management/x-twitter/): Real-time engagement and brand voice.
  - [Pinterest](/services/social-media-management/pinterest/): Visual search optimization and traffic strategy.
  - [Threads](/services/social-media-management/threads/): Conversational content for Meta's text platform.

### Advertising & Paid Media
- [Advertising](/services/advertising/): Algorithm-optimized paid media across Meta, Google, TikTok, CTV, and programmatic.
  - [Meta Ads](/services/advertising/meta-ads/): Post-Andromeda Meta advertising with Advantage+ and creative-as-targeting.
  - [Google Ads](/services/advertising/google-ads/): Search, Display, Shopping, Performance Max, and LSAs.
  - [TikTok Ads](/services/advertising/tiktok-ads/): Spark Ads, In-Feed, and creator-style ad production.
  - [YouTube Ads](/services/advertising/youtube-ads/): Pre-roll, bumpers, and video-first ad creative.
  - [LinkedIn Ads](/services/advertising/linkedin-ads/): B2B Sponsored Content, InMail, and Lead Gen Forms.
  - [CTV/OTT](/services/advertising/ctv-ott/): Connected TV and streaming ad campaigns.
  - [Programmatic](/services/advertising/programmatic/): Display, native, and video via real-time bidding.
  - [Retargeting](/services/advertising/retargeting/): Cross-platform remarketing campaigns.

### Content Production
- [Content Production](/services/content-production/): One film day, one month of content.
  - [Video Production](/services/content-production/video-production/): Brand videos, social content, and ad creative.
  - [Photography](/services/content-production/photography/): Brand, product, and lifestyle photography.
  - [UGC Creation](/services/content-production/ugc-creation/): Produced UGC-style content at scale.
  - [Short-Form Video](/services/content-production/short-form-video/): Reels, TikToks, and YouTube Shorts.
  - [Motion Graphics](/services/content-production/motion-graphics/): Animation, explainers, and kinetic typography.
  - [Copywriting](/services/content-production/copywriting/): Ad copy, social, web, and brand messaging.

### Website Development
- [Website Development](/services/website-development/): Modern, high-performance web architecture.
  - [Next.js](/services/website-development/nextjs-development/): SSG/ISR, SEO-first architecture.
  - [E-Commerce](/services/website-development/ecommerce/): Shopify, WooCommerce, and headless commerce.
  - [WordPress](/services/website-development/wordpress/): Custom themes and plugin development.
  - [Shopify](/services/website-development/shopify/): Store development and Shopify Plus.
  - [Web Apps](/services/website-development/web-apps/): Custom SaaS and interactive tools.
  - [CMS Development](/services/website-development/cms-development/): Payload, Strapi, and Sanity.
  - [Website Redesign](/services/website-development/website-redesign/): Performance audits and platform migration.

### SEO & Search
- [SEO](/services/seo/): Technical, local, content, and franchise SEO.
  - [Local SEO](/services/seo/local-seo/): Google Business Profile and map pack domination.
  - [Technical SEO](/services/seo/technical-seo/): Site speed, crawlability, and Core Web Vitals.
  - [E-Commerce SEO](/services/seo/ecommerce-seo/): Product page and category optimization.
  - [Content SEO](/services/seo/content-seo/): Keyword research, topic clustering, editorial planning.
  - [Franchise SEO](/services/seo/franchise-seo/): Multi-location SEO at scale.

### Answer Engine Optimization
- [AEO](/services/aeo/): Optimize for ChatGPT, Google AI Overviews, Perplexity.
  - [ChatGPT Optimization](/services/aeo/chatgpt-optimization/)
  - [Google AI Overviews](/services/aeo/google-ai-overviews/)
  - [Perplexity AI](/services/aeo/perplexity-optimization/)
  - [llms.txt Implementation](/services/aeo/llms-txt-implementation/)

### Branding & Design
- [Branding & Design](/services/branding-design/): Visual identity and brand systems.
  - [Brand Identity](/services/branding-design/brand-identity/)
  - [Brand Strategy](/services/branding-design/brand-strategy/)
  - [Graphic Design](/services/branding-design/graphic-design/)
  - [Packaging Design](/services/branding-design/packaging-design/)
  - [UI/UX Design](/services/branding-design/ui-ux-design/)

### Commercial Production
- [Commercial Production](/services/commercial-production/): Brand films, TV commercials, and production.
  - [Brand Films](/services/commercial-production/brand-films/)
  - [TV Commercials](/services/commercial-production/tv-commercials/)
  - [Product Videos](/services/commercial-production/product-videos/)
  - [Testimonials](/services/commercial-production/testimonial-videos/)
  - [Event Coverage](/services/commercial-production/event-coverage/)
  - [Drone Videography](/services/commercial-production/drone-videography/)

### Email Marketing & Automation
- [Email Marketing](/services/email-marketing/): Campaigns, automation, drip sequences, and SMS.
  - [Campaign Management](/services/email-marketing/email-campaign-management/)
  - [Marketing Automation](/services/email-marketing/marketing-automation/)
  - [Drip Campaigns](/services/email-marketing/drip-campaigns/)
  - [SMS Marketing](/services/email-marketing/sms-marketing/)

### AI Marketing Services
- [AI Services](/services/artificial-intelligence/): AI-powered content, ads, analytics, automation, and consulting.
  - [AI Content Production](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-content-production/)
  - [AI Ad Creative](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-ad-creative/)
  - [AI Analytics](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-analytics/)
  - [AI Automation](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-automation/)
  - [AI Chatbots](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-chatbots/)
  - [AI SEO](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-seo/)
  - [AI Strategy Consulting](/services/artificial-intelligence/ai-strategy/)
